text: Team SCD Deepavali Mega meet!22nd October 2022 (Saturday) 9pm onwardsPasir Ris Park Carpark Chttps://goo.gl/maps/6TUiQK843ueCELCu9There are over 200+ parking lots so do come early to secure a lot!Rules:1) Please clean up your trash and keep our parks clean.2) No pops & bangs & pulls.Feel free to bring your dinner/supper  camping chairs and tables  insect repellants  yourself and your car/cameras! Please be respectful for the public  one another  and make some friends!Team SCD Telegram:https://t.me/SGCARDISCUSSION
